episodes.title: Jehovah's Witness Judicial Meeting - Secret Recording
episodes.description:
The recording starts at 27:25 if you don't want to hear what led up to the meeting.
BE SURE TO TURN ON SUBTITLES DURING THE RECORDING! 

In this secret recording of my 'judicial meeting,' you'll get to see how questions are not allowed in the Jehovah's Witnesses. 

https://www.jwfacts.com/watchtower/disfellowship-shunning.php

Cults and high control groups use the threat of shunning to enforce absolute control. 

http://www.csj.org/infoserv_cult101/checklis.htm

#JehovahsWitnesses #Watchtower #JWORG

episodes.title: Why I left the Jehovah's Witnesses after 32 years - 607/1914 Failed Prophecy
episodes.description:
As a 'born in' Jehovah's Witness for the last 32 years, this is my story of leaving. I was a 4th generation witness and former Ministerial Servant (MS). I began to wake up in 2018 and officially disassociated myself from the congregation on January 17th, 2020.

I have plans to release the meetings (I recorded them) leading up to the Judicial meeting I was forced into. I had simply walked away from the congregation and had no intention of speaking up/out. After being forced to dissociation myself, I've realized I have an obligation. I would like the thank Watchtower for showing me that.

The first video I'm putting out will cover the most central doctrine of the Jehovah's Witnesses, that is, the 607/1914 teaching. I take a very in-depth look at this prophecy and detail why it cannot be accurate. Obviously, the 'generation that saw the events of 1914' HAS passed away. While that does illustrate how the prophecy has failed, immense archeological data has been exhumed since the 1950s. It proves without a doubt, that Jerusalem was not destroyed in 607 BCE as the WT teaches, rather, it was destroyed in 587/586. As this is false, the 1914 teaching is also proven false.

I'm a very analytical person and break each point down thoroughly. If you prefer more of an overview of all the point I would encourage you to check out Lloyd Evans video linked to below.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Cl7q8J6cpVQ&t=

I would also encourage you to watch the Pillowgate video as it shows you how creepy the org is lol. Get your popcorn :)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Xh6JdkXn5VY&t=

I would also like to thank the large army of ex-JWs that have come before and told their story. Lloyd Evans/John Cedars, EXJW Analyzer, Kim Mikey, Ali's Big TOE, Goatlike Personality, Jay the Comedian, Paul Grundy JWFACTS.com, ExJW Fifth, Kevin Mcfree, and the original OG, Ray Franz and his classic 'Crisis of Conscience.' 

Some links:
The most complete resource for waking up IMO - https://www.jwfacts.com

Jeffery Jackson Testifying Before the Austrailia Royal Commission 2015 - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=erWV8YnTFto

When Was Ancient Jerusalem Destroyed? - Part 1 https://wol.jw.org/en/wol/d/r1/lp-e/2011736

When Was Ancient Jerusalem Destroyed? - Part 2
https://wol.jw.org/en/wol/d/r1/lp-e/2011810

Carl Olof Jonsson's Rebuttal to Watchtower's 2011 2 Part Series (Oct/Nov) on Jerusalem - https://www.jwfacts.com/pdf/carl-olof-jonsson-when-jerusalem-destroyed.pdf

#JehovahsWitnesses #Watchtower #JWORG
